page.title: 04FARMING AND LANDSCAPE
page.content: {(FARMING AND LANDSCAPE CONTINUED FROM {PREVIOUS PAGE)} One of the fields has the M1 passing through it, another has sold his fields to a private building company who has built a new housing estate which has cut an old farm off in the middle of a building estate. The farm which sold the land to the building company is shortly getting houses built around it and will soon be swallowed up by the development,the farm still has sufficient land to produce it's crops of wheat. The farmers mainly use machinery on their farms. Most of the farmers having electricity pylons on their fields.
